short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: [Open-sourced] Highlight friend.tech gems info on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Friend.tech Gems aims to enrich your Twitter experience by highlighting valuable information related to friend.tech straight onto your feed. Dive into the gems of friend.tech without leaving your Twitter feed!

ðŸ’¡ This is a simple app that does not collect *any* private information. We only read the loaded twitter accounts on the screen and request friend.tech information regarding the accounts.

* This product is currently in beta. Prices and ranks may currently be inaccurate. Real-time data will be live soon *
